definitions.text: a feeling of strong eagerness (usually in favor of a person or cause)
examples: they were imbued with a revolutionary ardor
he felt a kind of religious zeal

definitions.text: excessive fervor to do something or accomplish some end
examples: he had an absolute zeal for litigation
they showed no eagerness to spread the gospel
they disliked his zeal in demonstrating his superiority
he tried to explain his forwardness in battle
